title: League crashing
body: My league client is fine but whenever i am in game the game keeps on crashing. Recently I have been playing ranked but league keeps on crashing and games keep becoming remade and im losing LP without it being my own fault.

replies.body:
Let's make sure to try fixing this first before jumping into ranked games that might make you drop from these crashes. Gotta make sure the game will work correctly before trying to up your rank!

Crashing typically means one of two things, either some of those game files are missing/corrupted or your pc just isn't able to run the game correctly anymore for some reason. Let's try running a repair first, and make sure you **test it in a custom/practice game**. If that doesn't help much, go ahead and double check your graphics drivers and hit the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover your basics.

I have exactly the same problem, never had issue like this before, only today.
Windows 10
Version 1703
Build 15063

Now people want to report me in games because I am a "retard with a shit pc" for playing... meanwhile this is the first time I have encountered this problem.
